Genuinely worst professor I have ever had at SFU, and I have been going here for four years. I strongly recommend anyone considering this class to not take it. The entire course is writing, two papers and two exams that are only long answer.

She constantly brings up her personal vendetta against feminist scholars for "taking grant money from her".

Prof is very well educated and kind. TA makes ur grade, and Marjan was very nice but soooo slow in marking. But, I am happy with my mark in the end because both were accessible and easy to communicate with.

Dr. Lysova is hands down the best prof in SFU crim. Her classes are so wonderful and her guidelines for papers are like i've never seen before. She lays out EXACTLY what you need to do, and tbh if someone got a bad mark on the paper its probably because they tried to cut corners on what was asked in the criteria. 10/10 prof i recommend her always!

It was a very interesting class and I learned a lot! This course has provided a lot of insight into the different perspectives of family violence that aren't always discussed in the mainstream media or research. Thank you, Professor Lysova

Dr. Lysova is one of my favourite professors at SFU. Her lectures are engaging and she clearly knows a lot about the area of violence and family violence in particular. Her grading expectations are clear and she is very open to students asking questions.

I took Family Violence and Criminal Justice with Dr. Lysova and it was definitely one of my favourite courses I took during my time at SFU. She's extremely knowledgeable about the course content and great at answering any questions in detail. It's easy to tell how much she genuinely cares for her student. I will miss her lectures!

Amazing semester and great class! I have enjoyed this course thoroughly and have learned many things about family violence. Dr. Lysova is an amazing professor. I have recommended this course to so many students because the material is important to learn. I have learned so many skills that can be applied to other criminology courses. Thank you!

Dr. Lysova is an excellent prof. She gives clear guidelines and grades fairly. You must do the readings for this class. All of them. Shes very knowledgeable on family violence and will deduct points if you miss important points or clearly arent sure what youre talking about. Overall, do the work and youll be rewarded
